body.p: Liquid Site is a content management system (CMS) for web sites. It supports web sites of a medium complexity, without need for special form data processing. Liquid Site contains modules with support for user forums, news, articles, products, calendars and much more. More detailed information is available in the feature list.
See the Liquid Site web site for the latest version available.
